name: Kristen Vaccaro
content: Kristen Vaccaro CONTACT ME kv @ ucsd.edu CV GitHub KRISTEN VACCARO ASSISTANT PROFESSOR COMPUTER SCIENCE & ENGINEERING UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA SAN DIEGO My work considers how to design the algorithmic experience of machine learning systems. I'm particularly interested in questions of agency and control, but also user understanding, justice, and policy. I often work on social computing applications (like news feed curation and content moderation) but I'm also interested in other areas, including my early work on fashion! I'm looking for students to work with, including PhD students joining UCSD! If you're interested, I have some more information here! CONTACT ME kv @ ucsd.edu CV GitHub NEWS May 2024 Congratulations to Mary Anne Smart on her new position at Purdue University!
